extendedInfo.description: If you are Ciara's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Ciara's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Ciara's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Ciara's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Goodies- Ciara: The Evolution- Fantasy Ride- Basic Instinct- One Woman Army-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - 1, 2 Step- Addicted- And I- Bang It Up- Basic Instinct (U Got Me)- C.R.U.S.H.- Can't Leave 'Em Alone- Ciara To The Stage- Crazy- Echo- Fit Of Love- G Is For Girl (A-Z)- Get In, Fit In- Get Up- Gimme Dat- Girls Get Your Money- Go Girl- Goodies- Goodies (Remix)- Got Me Good- Heavy Rotation- High Price- Hotline- I Don't Remember- I Found Myself- I Proceed- I Run It- I'm Just Me- I'm On- Keep Dancin' On Me- Like A Boy- Like A Surgeon- Listen To My Song- Livin' It Up- Lookin' At You- Love Sex Magic- Love You Better- Lover's Thing- Make It Last Forever- My Love- Never Ever- Next To You- Oh- Ooh Baby- Other Chicks- Pick Up The Phone- Promise- Promise (Go And Get Your Tickets Mix)- Pucker Up- Ride- So Hard- Sorry- Speechless- Sweat- Tell Me What Your Name Is- That's Right- The Evolution Of C (Interlude)- The Evolution Of Dance (Interlude)- The Evolution Of Fashion (Interlude)- The Evolution Of Music (Interlude)- The Title- This Is What Love Is- Thug Style- Turn It Up- Turntables- Wants For Dinner- When I- Work- Yeah I Know- You Can Get It- Body Party
